title: Which course is best, BA History Hons or BA English Hons? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both have their own importance, it all depends on the interest of a person whether he wants to go for History or English. Before making a choice between both, you should think about the career options after doing these courses. Career options: B.A. (English- Hons.): Successful graduates of the course are hired for roles such as Teacher, Policy Analyst, Writer, Editor, Publisher, Researcher, Communicator, Public Relations Officer, Speech Writer, Travel Writer, Blogger, Reviewer, Postsecondary English Teacher, Arts Administrator, Content Developer/ Manager etc. B.A. (History- Hons.) Successful graduates of the course are hired for roles such as Teacher, Govt. Job, Archaeology, Museum work, Media, Film making on historical, social culture etc. Be wise while choosing institute or university to pursue your studies in English or History, Because teaching faculty should have knowledge that how to make the base of the student, there are some good Universities which are famous for their professional teaching staff like: Christ UniversityLovely Professional UniversityKIIT UniversityAmity UniversityManipal University

Every one here have expressed well. The basic questions before you must be the choice of professional life/ career you would like to see yourself in. Let your heart lead first and the mind look for synergy. Next, after you understand the careers/ professions you could get to, just remember, for History you need good command on english (written and spoken), whereas for English, you do not need knowledge of History, but may get a chance to learn it all over again :) Both these tracks are good for Civil Servies also. But if you find you are good at Languages, you have a chance of adding foreign languages to your CV, which are very helpful in many career and professional streams.
